main event: A round, orange object was observed in the sky over Auburn, New York on August 2, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared to be hovering and then moved away rapidly, going down toward the ground.
The observer was unable to obtain any photographs of the object.
The object appeared similar to a landing light in size and shape.
The report notes that there was insufficient data to evaluate the sighting.
Other residents of Auburn reported observing the same object at the same time.
